lines.text: Is it really that boring being rich? I guess you're just naturally fucked up.
You were right Billy, I am a butthead!
Fuckin' nightmare.
Last night?
My life.
Are you scared?
I get scared.
Of what?
My parents, my sister... you.
Why?
I feel like something's gonna happen. And, if I scratch the surface, they'll be something terrible underneath.
It's perfectly normal to experience a certain irrational fear. It's no more than a phase. It'll pass, I assure you.
[takes a bite of an apple; which is infested with maggots and worms]
How do you feel about your family now, in light of all these recent victories?
My family?
Yes.
Uhm... nothing. I mean, I don't think about them, they don't think about me. We're just one big happy family... except for a little incest and psychosis.
Y'know, you really deserve what's going to happen to you.
What's gonna happen?
You're going to make a wonderful contribution to society.
You've been living with these people all your life, and you didn't know anything about this?
I wanna know what happened to Blanchard. And I wanna know what your did to my sister.

You know the schedule; first, we dine. Then, I fucked your sister. Then, everybody else got so turned on, they fucked her too. As far as big ol' breath Blanchard goes; I ran that low-rent fool right into a pole. Pretty busy week, don't you think?
How do you like your tea? Cream, sugar... or do you want me to pee in it?

[after being speechless for a few seconds]
You are a class act, Clarissa.
Just a little bit paranoid, Bill, within normal ranges.
If you have any Oedipal fantasies you'd like to indulge in, Billy, now's the time!
Fuck you, butthead!
Paranoid? I'm not paranoid. All my fears are real.
No, no, no, no, no, no!
